amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 117-9 as en bloc No. 1: Nos. 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 15, 16, 17, 20 and 21.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 2 comprised of amendments numbered 6, 12, 13, 18, and 39, printed in Part B of House Report 117-9.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lofgren amendments (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 210 (Roll no. 52).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) pursuant to the rule.
Amendments en bloc (A002) offered by Ms. Lofgren.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lofgren amendments (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 210 (Roll no. 52).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Lofgren amendments (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 210 (Roll no. 52).
